vengeful_pursuit.name: Vengeful Pursuit
vengeful_pursuit.desc: Your running Basic Attacks that don't hit send out a special mid-range crescent projectile that slows on hit. Tracks onto those with their backs turned to you. 8s CD.

relentless_hunt.name: Relentless Hunt
relentless_hunt.desc: Basic Attack while doing an Aerial Attack to initiate a special gap closer attack.

flow_state.name: Flow State
flow_state.desc: Enter a moment of extreme focus in which you can change the windup of your special attack with the correct timing.

rising_star.name: Rising Star
rising_star.desc: Press CTRL + M2 to activate a special uppercut attack.

true_vantage.name: True Vantage
true_vantage.desc: Venting makes you invisible briefly while boosting your speed.

ankle_cutter.name: Ankle Cutter
ankle_cutter.desc: You can now do a special ground slash while sliding, applying a temporary speed debuff to those hit, as well as preventing jumping.

dread_fighter.name: Dread Fighter
dread_fighter.desc: Parrying and getting hit by mantras now give you stacks of Dread. Each stack increases your mantra resistance, up to 25%. Each stack lasts for 15 seconds.

mayhem.name: Mayhem
mayhem.desc: Initiate a special dash attack by pressing Basic Attack during the start of your dodge.

merciless_blade.name: Merciless Blade
merciless_blade.desc: You now execute enemies much faster.

unmatched_dexterity.name: Unmatched Dexterity
unmatched_dexterity.desc: Press X to Quick Swap between weapons within your toolbar.

oath_silentheart.name: Oath: Silentheart
oath_silentheart.desc:
You vow to reject the Words of the Song, denying yourself of mantras in pursuit of your own path to true strength, no matter the cost. You can wield weapons with half the usual requirements.
[Note: Only reduces requirements by 25, not half.]

silent_cascade.name: Silent Cascade
silent_cascade.desc: Landing physical attacks on an opponent charges up your Silent Cascade, a devastating barrage that can be unleashed with CTRL + M2.
